hero_section.title: Excellence in Fire, Rescue and First Aid Training
hero_section.description: Delivering elite training programs for recruits, professionals, and international partners to protect lives and communities.

training.title: Empowering Safety through Excellence in Training and Leadership
training.description: Dedicated to Protecting Lives and Property, the National Fire School stands as a beacon of advanced training and continuous development in fire safety, rescue operations, and first aid. Our institution is built on the principles of expertise, leadership, and service, ensuring that every graduate is prepared to face emergencies with confidence and skill.

training_1.title: Continuous Professional Development
training_1.description: Ongoing education and training opportunities for professionals in the field, fostering a culture of lifelong learning and improvement in safety practices.

training_2.title: Advanced Fire Safety Training
training_2.description: Comprehensive programs designed to equip professionals with the knowledge and techniques necessary to prevent and combat fires effectively, ensuring the safety of communities.

training_3.title: Rescue Operations Expertise
training_3.description: Focused training that empowers individuals to perform high-stakes rescue missions, saving lives in challenging and dangerous environments.

training_4.title: First Aid and Emergency Response
training_4.description: Critical instruction in first aid, ensuring that trainees are prepared to provide immediate and effective care during medical emergencies.

training_5.title: International Collaborations
training_5.description: Our school collaborates with global partners, sharing knowledge and expertise to enhance safety standards and emergency response capabilities worldwide.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.description: Find answers to the most commonly asked questions about our training programs, admissions, certifications, and the role of the Algerian Civil Protection.
faq.title_1: What types of training programs are offered at the National School of firefighter?
faq.description_1: We offer a wide range of programs focusing on fire safety, rescue operations, first aid, and emergency management, designed for both new recruits and experienced professionals.
faq.title_2: Who can apply to the training programs?
faq.description_2: Our programs are open to individuals from all sectors who are interested in advancing their skills in fire safety and emergency management, including national and international candidates.
faq.title_3: What is the role of the Algerian Civil Protection?
faq.description_3: What is the role of the Algerian Civil Protection?
faq.title_4: How does the certification process work?
faq.description_4: Upon completion of our training programs, participants undergo evaluations to ensure they meet the required standards and receive certifications recognized by the Algerian Civil Protection
faq.title_5: Are international participants allowed to join the training programs?
faq.description_5: International participants can join the training programs only if their country has a contract or agreement with the Algerian Civil Protection or the Algerian government.

partners.title: Our Trusted Partners
partners.description: We proudly collaborate with esteemed national and international organizations, enhancing our training programs and fostering global cooperation.

sonatrach.title: SONATRACH
sonatrach.description: Sonatrach is Algeria's leading oil and gas company, established in 1963. It manages the full spectrum of hydrocarbon activities from exploration to marketing. Sonatrach is vital to Algeria’s economy, driving significant export revenues.

air_algerie.title: Air Algérie
air_algerie.description: Air Algérie, founded in 1947, is Algeria’s national airline, connecting the country to major international destinations. With a modern fleet, it emphasizes safety, quality service, and showcases Algerian hospitality worldwide.

news.title: Latest News
news.description: Stay informed with the latest news and updates from the National School of Firefighters. Explore our recent activities, upcoming events, and important announcements.

footer.description: The Algerian National School of Firefighters is a premier institution dedicated to training elite firefighters and safety professionals. Established to enhance public safety, it offers rigorous programs that combine practical skills with advanced knowledge.
